```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(here)
```

```{r}
knitr::include_graphics('figs/sktall.png')
```

# By month

::: panel-tabset
```{r}
#| results: asis
fls <- list.files(here('figs'), '_', full.names = F)
mos <- fls %>% 
  basename %>% 
  gsub('^skt_|\\.png', '', .) %>% 
  as.numeric() %>% 
  sort() %>% 
  month(label = T) %>% 
  as.character()
for(mo in seq_along(mos)){
  cat('## ', mos[mo], '\n\n')
  
  chnk <- paste0('![](figs/', fls[mo], ')\n')
  cat(chnk)
  
  cat('\n\n')
  
}
```
:::
